scripts.version:major: npm version major --workspaces && git add **/package.json; npm version major --include-workspace-root --force
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --workspaces && git add **/package.json; npm version minor --include-workspace-root --force
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --workspaces && git add **/package.json; npm version patch --include-workspace-root --force
scripts.version:prerelease: npm version prerelease --workspaces --preid alpha && git add **/package.json; npm version prerelease --include-workspace-root --force --preid alpha
